dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Trademark Abuse]

T

09:00:15 -0600

esmtp (Exim) id 1FNtCS-000CaU-RX        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 27 Mar
2006 09:00:10 -0600
X-MIMEOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.0.6603.0

neither        permitted nor denied by domain of classicmedia.tv)

helo=mail.classicmedia.tv;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -102.6
Subject: [ABUSE] Trademark Abuse
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.7
Precedence: list
List-Id: <abuse.lists.theplanet.com>
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com

I am the IP attorney for Classic Media, Inc. which owns the  > trademarks
and copyrights related to the Casper cartoon character.
 > It was recently brought to my attention by the Anti-Defamation  > League
that a white supremacy group is misusing and infringing upon  > this
valuable children's character.  Specifically, on  ;
http://www.Invisibleknights.com/ images of Casper are shown  > depicting
Casper as a KKK member holding a confederate flag.  This is a flagrant abuse
of the property rights in the character and such use dilutes the trademark.
We would greatly appreciate your taking whatever actions are legally allowed
to immediately remove these infringing and hateful  > images from this
website or shutting them down completely.
 >
 > Please keep me apprised of what actions are taken and thank you for  >
your kind attention.
 >
 >
 > Very truly yours,
 >
 > Sonja Keith
 >
 >
 > IP Counsel
 >
 > Classic Media, Inc.
 >
 > 860 Broadway, 6th Fl.
 >
 > New York, NY 10003
 >
 > (212) 659-1954
 >
 > sk@classicmedia.tv
